Label: XML
Comment: "We think the national dialling prefix is 0 - it seems this was a change in 2005 (or 2008)\nalong with the new city codes. However, their official document makes no mention of it,\nwebsites disagree, and we are not sure if the change has actually been made."

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "Includes telephone numbers in Nagorno-Karabakh Republic, physically located inside\nAzerbaijan, which use prefix 47."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "Part of the range 97 is used by Nagorno-Karabakh Republic."
